news_header: Amsterdam Island in the southern Indian Ocean has been on fire for nearly a month, with over 55% of its area affected. The island, uninhabited but used for research since the 1980s, saw 31 people evacuated to Réunion Island.
news_original_title: Half of French island in Indian Ocean burnt by wildfire
news_text: The fires, exacerbated by dry conditions and strong winds, have impacted wildlife and research operations. A French mission is now assessing the damage and securing the settlement.
